Class SingleSocketRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • kieker.analysis.plugin.reader.tcp.util.AbstractTcpReader

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SingleSocketRecordReader
extends AbstractTcpReader
    Represents a TCP reader which reads and reconstructs Kieker records from a single TCP stream.
    Since:
    1.13
    Author:
    Christian Wulf (chw)

    • Method Detail

      • onBufferReceived

        protected boolean onBufferReceived(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Specified by:
        onBufferReceived in class AbstractTcpReader
        Parameters:
        buffer - to be read from
        Returns:
        • true when there were enough bytes to perform the read operation
        • false otherwise. In this case, the buffer is reset, compacted, and filled with new content.
